Question
========
  
A b-these student wants to know whether there are differences in working memory between three groups of young people: those who are normally gifted (IQ≥85), those who are weakly gifted (70<IQ<85) and those with mild intellectual disabilities (IQ≤70). She is also curious whether the differences in working memory between these groups of adolescents are greater or smaller when adolescents have received working memory training. She has a dataset with the variables working memory, IQ group and participation in working memory training (yes/no). Which method is best suited to answer her questions? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANOVA with one factor.
* ANOVA with two factors.
* ANCOVA.
* Single-factor linear regression.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
